text: About Schmidt is a 2002 American comedy-drama movie set in Nebraska and Colorado. It was directed by Alexander Payne and starred Jack Nicholson. == Other websites == * Category:2002 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s road movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American road movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in Nebraska Category:Works about old age Category:Movies directed by Alexander Payne
title: About Schmidt
